title: Typographic drawings
content:
I just stumbled across these drawings by a bloke called Tom Mazullo. He seems to have a nice obsession with type and the mechanical. Though he’s obviously drawing his letters for other purposes I thought you lot might appreciate them. They have an endearing material quality to them.

[Almost Words](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002725/http:/www.tommazzullo.com/almost1.html)  
 [Incantations](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002725/http:/www.tommazzullo.com/incantations1.html)  
 [The rest of his stuff](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002725/http:/www.tommazzullo.com/)

 [‹ arabic / latin / hebrew question](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44526 "Go to previous forum topic") [diversion: the rather difficult font game ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007002725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44483 "Go to next forum topic")
author: olho
